title: r/Prorevenge Cheat On Me? I'll Destroy Your Wedding!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's episode, OP is friends with a girl who turns out to be a lying, cheating, manipulator who scams OP out of THOUSANDS of dollars. When OP finds out that she also had an affair with her boyfriend, OP decides to get some pro revenge and completely destroy her friend's wedding! Your happiest day of your life is about to be your most embarrassing, Karen! If you like this content, be sure to follow for more daily Reddit episodes!
